titleStmt.title: The tragedy of Hero and Leander, or, The two unfortunate lovers. ... To a pleasant new tune, or, I will never love thee more.
titleStmt.author: Musaeus, Grammaticus. Hero and Leander.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Burton, at the Horse shooe [sic] in Westsmithfield, neer the Hospital-gate,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Based on a work of the same name by Musaeus Grammaticus.
Reproduction of originals in: British Library (reel 2123.2:152-153) and Glasgow University Library (reel 2594:9).

place.placeName: the Horse shooe [sic] in Westsmithfield, neer the Hospital-gate
